sequence.name: Slide2.svg
sequence.text: The GPDMA channel is waiting for request

sequence.name: Slide3.svg
sequence.text: Request is received by GPDMA and GPDMA start transfer

sequence.name: Slide4.svg
sequence.text: Data are read from source location

sequence.name: Slide5.svg
sequence.text: Data are temporary stored in GPDMA channel until destination port is available

sequence.name: Slide7.svg
sequence.text: The requested transfer is now complete the GPDMA channel can now accepts additional request
